reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 827/93: COMPOSITION OF STATUTORY COMMITTEES
reg_info.act_under: Medicine Act, 1991   Loi de 1991 sur les médecins

content.content: 1.  (1) The Executive Committee shall be composed of, (a) the President and Vice-President of the Council; (b) two members of the Council who are members of the College; and (c) two members of the Council appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council. (2) The President shall chair the Executive Committee. O. Reg. 827/93, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. (1) The Executive Committee shall be composed of,

(a) the President and Vice-President of the Council;

(b) two members of the Council who are members of the College; and

(c) two members of the Council appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council.

(2) The President shall chair the Executive Committee. O. Reg. 827/93, s. 1.

content.content: 2.  The Registration Committee shall be composed of, (a) four members of the Council who are members of the College; (b) three members of the Council appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council. O. Reg. 827/93, s. 2.
content.raw_html:
2. The Registration Committee shall be composed of,

(a) four members of the Council who are members of the College;

(b) three members of the Council appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council. O. Reg. 827/93, s. 2.

content.content: 3.  The Complaints Committee shall be composed of, (a) two members of the Council who are members of the College; (b) three members of the Council appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council; and (c) four members of the College. O. Reg. 827/93, s. 3.
content.raw_html:
3. The Complaints Committee shall be composed of,

(a) two members of the Council who are members of the College;

(b) three members of the Council appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council; and

(c) four members of the College. O. Reg. 827/93, s. 3.

content.content: 4.  The Discipline Committee shall be composed of, (a) four members of the council who are members of the College; (b) four members of the Council appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council; and (c) six members of the College. O. Reg. 827/93, s. 4.
content.raw_html:
4. The Discipline Committee shall be composed of,

(a) four members of the council who are members of the College;

(b) four members of the Council appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council; and

(c) six members of the College. O. Reg. 827/93, s. 4.

content.content: 5.  The Fitness to Practise Committee shall be composed of, (a) three members of the Council who are members of the College; (b) three members of the Council appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council; and (c) two members of the College. O. Reg. 827/93, s. 5.
content.raw_html:
5. The Fitness to Practise Committee shall be composed of,

(a) three members of the Council who are members of the College;

(b) three members of the Council appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council; and

(c) two members of the College. O. Reg. 827/93, s. 5.

content.content: 6.  The Quality Assurance Committee shall be composed of, (a) four members of the Council who are members of the College; (b) four members of the Council appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council; and (c) three members of the College. O. Reg. 827/93, s. 6.
content.raw_html:
6. The Quality Assurance Committee shall be composed of,

(a) four members of the Council who are members of the College;

(b) four members of the Council appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council; and

(c) three members of the College. O. Reg. 827/93, s. 6.

content.content: 7.  The Patient Relations Committee shall be composed of, (a) two members of the Council who are members of the College; (b) four members of the Council appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council; and (c) two members of the College. O. Reg. 827/93, s. 7.
content.raw_html:
7. The Patient Relations Committee shall be composed of,

(a) two members of the Council who are members of the College;

(b) four members of the Council appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council; and

(c) two members of the College. O. Reg. 827/93, s. 7.

content.content: 8. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 827/93, s. 8.
content.raw_html: 8. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 827/93, s. 8.
